price: And [He created] the horses, mules and donkeys for you to ride and for adornment, and He creates other things that you do not know.
arabic: وَٱلۡخَيۡلَ وَٱلۡبِغَالَ وَٱلۡحَمِيرَ لِتَرۡكَبُوهَا وَزِينَةٗۚ وَيَخۡلُقُ مَا لَا تَعۡلَمُونَ

version.title: English Translation - Rowwad Translation Center
